---
title: "Bitcoin Trading Indicators"
output: html_notebook
---

Create Bitcoin indicators for trading.



```{r}
library(coinmarketcapr)
```


Setup key

```{r}
key <- 'c3c0cb59-d8c8-4e30-a874-7eee4dcdacb1'

coinmarketcapr::setup(key)
```



Get crypto listings

```{r}
cryptos <- get_crypto_listings(limit = 50)
```
